reviewText: In no way does this deserve the negative review before me. It's short but you can make this as intense or easy as you like. I do most of it with a 10 lb kettlebell and make all of the cardio high-impact. This gives me a great workout in about 35 minutes. Gin is friendly and cues well.
Title: Power Abs Medicine Ball Workout with Gin Miller

reviewText: It is a good workout because it is different but not a "killer" workout.  It indirectly works your core but the specific ab exercises are not that difficult.  I would say that your legs are going to be the place that you feel it the most and maybe some shoulders.
Title: Power Abs Medicine Ball Workout with Gin Miller

reviewText: I'm a senior who works out to keep fit - and this video certainly helps me do that! I like using the medicine ball for some switch-up in my routine, and the length is just right to ensure that I get my workout in before work. Any longer and I might find a reason for not doing it!And I really like Gin Miller. She motivates me, and I feel like she cares about the people who use her products.
summary: A nice change to my workout
Title: Power Abs Medicine Ball Workout with Gin Miller

reviewerName: Monette L. Bebow Reinhard "author of Felling ...
reviewText: I find myself coming back to this one with my medicine ball, rather than the DVD that came with the ball, because the workouts are of the right intensity, meaning that I'm able to complete them and feel I spent the time well.  The exercises are actually quite enjoyable.
Title: Power Abs Medicine Ball Workout with Gin Miller

reviewText: This was my first Gin Miller workout DVD which came with Medicine Ball (6 pound). I love how she makes the viewer feel so comfortable and at ease throughout the exercise program, and if you are uncomfortable with some of the moves, she suggests you put the ball down and go through the moves without it. What's really unique about this DVD the camera work  - it shows three different types of footwork you can do during the cardio segment and profiles her from another angle while she is doing the various exercises. Her assistant, Jamie, does the work out with her and modifies some of the moves. They are a good team together. I enjoyed Gin so much I purchased her Kettlebell workout and look forward to adding many more of her exercise DVDs to my collection.
Title: Power Abs Medicine Ball Workout with Gin Miller
